byline.original: By KEN BELSON and BEN STRAUSS

abstract: NFL Draft in Chicago drew huge crowds, leaving many wondering whether city will host 2016 event.
lead_paragraph: Despite the success of this year’s event in Chicago, the N.F.L. has been noncommittal about whether it would hold it here again next year.

headline.main: City for Next Year’s Draft? N.F.L. Could Have Its Pick
headline.print_headline: City for Next Year’s Draft? N.F.L. Could Have Its Pick

snippet: Despite the success of this year’s event in Chicago, the N.F.L. has been noncommittal about whether it would hold it here again next year.
